medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset severe diffuse abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started the afternoon prior to admission and progressed over the course of the evening. The patient associated symptoms of nausea and vomiting. Last bowel movement was at 8 PM the preceding night, which was normal with no blood or diarrhea. The patient reported never having experienced pain like this before. Denied dysuria and fever but had chills.
